name: Untitled Colors
description:
Spacebar to Jump

Game for Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 1)

Soooo, yea my first game jam ever. I was actually going for an idea I had with 3D platforming. But I realized it was too hard for now, so I discarded it, slapped together an idea, and made a small looping game in about 3 days left. That may or may not look like a monochrome version of flappy bird. But yea, it's here and I hope you like it.
